Kitchenka was punished for leaving a 4-year-old daughter in danger

13 February 2024 13:17

Turns out nobody was home except a 4-year-old girl. The baby's mother was found-- she explained to the law enforcement agencies that she left her daughter alone in the apartment, going to a clinic with a senior son. The woman was hoping to go home quickly and not take the girl with her.
